resources.string: Log in with an OPPO account to access more quality services from the official OPPO website, Market, Game Center, ?Theme Store, and more.

Setting a passcode and fingerprints can secure the phone. \nFingerprint may be used instead of passcode to unlock the phone or make payments.
You can synchronize data such as contacts, SMS messages, notes, and calendars (which may use mobile data or Wi-Fi); moreover, you can find a lost phone by using the positioning function
If you have a data package subscription, we recommend you use mobile data. However, please note that your carrier will charge additional fees for data in excess of the package.

We will collect statistics on your use of various product functions to improve the product and service. The collection process will be in compliance with our privacy policy.

The Wi-Fi assistant will smartly choose the Wi-Fi or mobile network with the best connectivity, and automatically enable and connect via Wi-Fi when in a place you frequently visit (such as the office or home) according to the Wi-Fi networks you used.
